content: **size ** m 72 sts fits a foot or leg of 8 75 22 5 cm **materials** yarns 75-105 g zwerger opal wool 75% nylon 25% 425 m/100 g main colour mc 50-60 g contrast colour cc 25-30 g **needles ** us 1 2 25 mm and us 2 2 5 mm **notions ** 3 markers cable needle **gauge** 32 sts/42 rounds = 4 /10 cm in stockinette stitch 34 sts/52 rounds = 4 /10 cm in pattern stitch charts these charts are worked using slipped stitches unlike stranded knitting there are no colour changes during the round no threads floating at the back of the work or at the inside of the sock each round is worked completely in one colour the colour changes are created by slipping the stitches
